prompts: Create a powerful bug-type Pokemon with striking yellow and black patterns.
Give me a majestic Pokemon resembling a queen bee, complete with a regal crown.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of teamwork and hive mentality.
Imagine a Pokemon that can control swarms and has a strong defensive strategy.
Design a bug/flying type Pokemon with a unique honeycomb-inspired body structure.
Generate a Pokemon that serves as a protector of nature's balance in forests.
Make a Pokemon that has both elegance and strength, reflecting its queen status.
